description:
The Tendoshu and Yatagarasu swoop in for the kill after the Shogun and Hitotsubashi factions wear each other out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 7: Après une bataille, les corbeaux croassent
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Seven: The Crows Caw After the Battle Ends
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Nana: Ikusa no Ato ni wa Karasu ga Naku
将軍暗殺篇七 戦のあとには烏が哭く
